title: Texas Hold 'Em Poker App
description: Poker Simulation Application developed using Qt and C++. Includes features such as custom game settings, AI bot decisions, stats tracker, and more!

title: Small Shell Program
description: Custom shell linux program built to handle executing and error handling strings from command line, file redirection, custom signal handlers and more!

title: VGA Driver
description: Created a VGA driver from scratch on an Intel FPGA using Quartus Prime and ModelSim for debugging. Built main VGA driver component using custom modules, such as a clock div, counter, and more!

title: Tetris
description: Created Tetris using the raylib library in C++ for a larger project consisting of a game launcher and custom games.

title: Multi-Threaded Line Processor
description: Multi-threaded consumer-producer pipeline for a line processor program in C.

title: One Time Pad
description: Server-Client program created to encrypt and decrypt text using a random key generator in C.

title: Alarm Clock
description: Functional alarm clock created using Quartus Prime, SystemVerilog, and circuit schematics; tested via ModelSim.

title: TalkTask
description: To-do list web application that utilizes speech recognition for task management and an AI model to provide suggested tasks based on user history.
